meanings.definition: The quality of being honorable or worthy of respect.
meanings.sent1: Her honorableness shone through when she returned the lost wallet.
meanings.sent2: His honorableness in always telling the truth earned him the trust of his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's honorableness in sharing its toy with the dog was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: The honorableness of the old oak tree, standing tall and strong, inspired all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The honorableness of the firefighter risking his life to save others was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of having a good reputation or being esteemed.
meanings.sent1: The honorableness of the local hero was known far and wide.
meanings.sent2: She achieved honorableness in the community through her charitable work.
meanings.sent3: The honorableness of the clown's performance left everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The honorableness of the sun setting over the ocean painted the sky in brilliant colors.
meanings.sent5: The honorableness of the mountain peak, reaching high into the sky, was a sight to behold.
